root.name: Wonder Project J: Kikai no Shounen Pino
root.description: OverviewWonder Project J: Kikai no Shounen Pino (translates to "Wonder Project J: Mechanical Boy Pino") is a raising sim published by Enix in 1994 for the Super Famicom. The game was developed by Almanic Corp and was the last game they created before their company's name was changed to Givro Corporation in 1995. Givro developed a squeal to Wonder Project J in 1996 for the Nintendo 64 called Wonder Project J2, where the player raises a robot girl named Josette.Wonder Project J was never officially released in English but the rom hacking group, WakdHacks, released an English patch for the game on August 5, 2001.
